title: Jazz
marks: Signature, Title, Date, and Mark LRC, in pencil: [Chizuko Yoshida 1954]; LLC, in pe
description: abstract image: layers of bright orange and bright red loops and curlicues over brown circles extending from ULQ across to LRQ; bright blue, orange, brown, red, and tan squares throughout; horizontal bright blue narrow rectangles almost dance across image, beginning LLQ extending up to URQ; tan zigzag from ULQ across to LRQ; vertical and horizontal black lines cut across the mass of shapes; tan concentric arcs across image, emanating from URQ to LLQ resemble sound waves; brownish orage, light blue, and cream colored background
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
